nodes.text: Choose Your Destiny: An Obi-Wan & Anakin Adventure

Choose Your Destiny: An Obi-Wan & Anakin Adventure is a canon adventure book written by Cavan Scott and illustrated by Elsa Charretier, and it is the third novel in the Star Wars: Choose Your Destiny series. The story is set before the events of Star Wars: Episode II Attack of the Clones, and it has over twenty possible outcomes, one of which is considered canonical. The book was first published on March 19, 2019 by Disney–Lucasfilm Press.
Join Obi-Wan Kenobi and Anakin Skywalker on a mission to rescue the captured Jedi Master.
With over twenty possible outcomes, you'll have to use the Force to keep Obi-Wan and Anakin safe from rogue battle droids, masked marauders, and so much more!
